name: Left on Mars
description:
Hey!!

Welcome to Left on Mars!! Left on Mars is a meat 3D shooter set in sci-fi setting

Find your way back to Earth! The game features:

  • 3 unique levels, including the final indoor level with platforming elements (use double-jump!)
  • Rebalanced weapons, enemies, guns 
  • Added some triggers - e.g. enemies or items spawning conditionally in runtime

Enjoy!
